title.en: Analysis of the Work of Art

description.en: The seminar introduces analysis and interpretation of visual art based on various methods and practical exercises of their use. Student present an analysis on a freely chosen topic that is going to be discussed and supplemented by the seminar group.
description.et: Seminaris tutvustatakse visuaalse kunsti analüüsimist ja tõlgendamist mitmesuguste meetoditega ning harjutatakse nende kasutamist. Iga üliõpilane esitab enda valitud kunstiteose analüüsi, mida seminarirühm arutab ja täiendab.

objectives.en: To teach indenpendently to analyse and to interprete art works.
objectives.et: Anda üliõpilastele oskusi iseseisvalt analüüsida ja tõlgendada kujutava kunsti teoseid.

learning_outcomes.en:
Will be able indenpendently evaluate art works.
Can make choises on the methods of interpretation and to provide sufficient argumentation for these choises.
